name: DREAMIO: AI-Powered Adventures
description:
DREAMIO: AI-Powered Adventures is an innovative "choose your own adventure" game powered by the latest advancements in generative AI. Your decisions shape the narrative in real-time, offering a unique, personalized adventure with every playthrough.

Dynamic AI-Generated Content


  • Story: Your journey unfolds dynamically in response to the choices you make.
  • Illustrations: Auto-generated illustrations bring your journey to life.
  • Narration: Thanks to speech synthesis, a narrator accompanies you throughout your journey.

Multiple Interaction Modes


  • Type manually.
  • Speak into your microphone.
  • Pick from suggested choices.

Stories are told in the second-person point of view. This lets you interact with the narrator directly. You can ask him about your character or environment, or engage in a debate.

Customizable Gameplay


By default, the narrator will trigger a game over screen if you die and will reject impossible actions. But with simple natural language instructions, you can modify how the narrator operates, adjusting the challenges and freedoms within your story as you see fit.

Save System


Thanks to the save system, you can explore different story branches and outcomes freely. Your every decision leads to a unique adventure!

Endless Exploration


Choose from preinstalled starting prompts or create your own! Share and download prompts via Steam Workshop. Whether you're surviving a zombie apocalypse or exploring an alien planet, the possibilities are limitless.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2795060/



Note: The operating costs of AI services used by this game are covered by an in-game currency referred to as tokens. Upon purchasing the game, you receive a starting amount of tokens, which covers the costs of AI services up to the cost of the game itself. You have the option to provide your own API keys to bypass the token system entirely.

Tokens were the best way I could find to make inherent operating costs of AI services transparent to the players.
